0110111111110111 0001010100100010 0 -> sum: 1000010100011001, cout: 0
0010010110101110 1100010000111111 1 -> sum: 1110100111101110, cout: 0
1100100011100010 1000011000001101 0 -> sum: 0100111011101111, cout: 1

1011101001100001 0111101100001110 1 -> sum: 0011010101110000, cout: 1
